title: Classic R&B font?
content:
Anyone know of any fonts connected with classic R&B music? Maybe from a classic album cover, or record label?   
Thanks!
author: scottsherise

comments.content: Can you point us to an album cover or two? Or at least an era? Do you mean 50s or 60s? MoTown?

Wierd, I answered this a while ago, and I just saw it didn't work...   
   
Thanks Patricia!   
I know, that's pretty general...60's motown would be great...just something that is genuine to the time.
